features.name: FR-7.2: Bounded Retry Logic with Session-Level Circuit Breaker
features.description: Agent SHALL retry failed features max 3 times, then mark blocked. After 5 consecutive failed sessions, terminate autonomous loop.
features.requirements:
Per-Feature Retry (max 3 attempts):
Attempt 1: Standard implementation
Attempt 2: Simplified approach (remove 'SHOULD' features, keep 'SHALL')
Attempt 3: Minimal viable version (core functionality only)
After 3 failures: Mark blocked, log details, continue to next feature
Session-Level Circuit Breaker:
Session = One complete pass through all remaining features
Session fails if: completion rate <50% OR >30% features blocked OR critical infrastructure blocker
After 5 consecutive failed sessions: Terminate autonomous loop (exit code 42)
Generate summary report: autonomous_summary_report.md with completion stats, blocked features, root causes, next steps
Reset counter after successful session (≥50% completion, <30% blocked)
Progress Tracking Files:
autonomous_build_log.md (append-only human-readable log)
feature_list.json (structured feature status)
session_progress.json (session count, failures, completion rates)

verification_criteria.functional:
Retry logic implements 3-attempt strategy
After 3 failures, feature marked blocked, agent continues
Blocked features logged with failure summary
verification_criteria.technical:
Retry count tracked in feature_list.json
All attempt failures logged with complete error context
Hard timeout enforced: 30 min per attempt
verification_criteria.integration:
